description:
In feudal Japan, Naraku has sent a demon called Mimisenri to look for the Sacred Jewel shards. Meanwhile, Kagome returns to the present day, and finds that the school is in the middle of preparing for the cultural festival.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Don`t Boil It! The Terrifying Dried-Up Demon
Nicha Dame! Kyoufu no Himono Youkai
煮ちゃダメ! 恐怖の干物妖怪
